column5: North Pigeon Lake is 74-76 F today. The hunt for eyes begins.
Begins? Its musky time now!!  S.
Water temps on my lake were 55* today. Up 3* from last week. Getting close to killer fall pike and laker fishing time.
Too hot for either. LOL Yesterday was quite hot out on the water.
I was kinda hoping for some more fall like weather by now. But the weather has been stable for awhile... wonder it will be out there this weekend.
Calling for hotter weather on Saturday and Sunday!
65 on the lake this morning. Bath water still. LOL
